# File ../lib/sqlpostgres/Translate.rb, line 200
    def escape_array_noquote(a, &escaper)
      pieces = a.collect do |e|
        if e.is_a?(Array)
          escape_array_noquote(e, &escaper)
        else
          escaped = escaper.call(e.to_s).
            gsub(/'/, "\\\\'").
            gsub(/"/, "\\\\\\\"")
          '"' + escaped + '"'
        end
      end
      "{" + pieces.join(',') + "}"
    end
